𓌂 𓀭 | mighty one, Power |

𒈮 Keil 𒆗 kal kala kalag "mighty" Kraft

𒈮 MUG might ≈ 𓍊 mönktum 'potence' 𒈮 MUG < munk 𓏠 𓈖 𓐍 𓍊 मङ्गल maṅgala 𓅓 𓆓 𓏏 𓆑 𓏏 𓍊 <> ♂ Mars 𒈮 MUG < munk 𓏠 𓈖 𓐍 𓍊 𒈠𒀭𒂵𒊏; 𒁑 ma-an-ga-ra "chisel" mangara > mace #maggaru

𒈮 MUG ≈ 𒌇 TUG in 𒀉𒌇 a₂tuku atuku powerful able-bodied tüchtig ≈ күчтүү küçtüü 𒀉𒌇 •ama.tuku 𐌼𐌰𐌷𐍄𐌴𐌹𐌲𐍃 matuku mighty #igigallu;lē'û 力

𒈠 𒇻𒌋𒋾 maᵍlu-u-ti megaloty > mighty

𒊊 ≈ 𓃮 power, virility in Egyptian and Sumerian 𒊊𒅅 𒉈𒅅 neĝal megaˡ #emūqu mighty

𒆗𒉡 •crab ~ grave 𒆗𒉡 great, mighty, poor, powerful, strong

𒁍 SÍR 𓋴𓂋𓏮𓃱

𒊭𒂵𒁍𒊒 ša-ga-pu-ru 𒊭𒂵𒁍𒊒 majestic, mighty
